Exercises.Instruction: Warm up for 10 minutes, Run up Uetliberg at a comfortable pace, cool down for 10 minutes
Strength training: Squats - 3 sets of 12 reps, Push-ups - 3 sets of 10 reps, Planks - 3 sets of 30 seconds
Interval training: Run for 1 minute, walk for 1 minute, repeat for 20 minutes, cool down for 10 minutes
Warm up for 10 minutes, Run up Uetliberg at a slightly faster pace, cool down for 10 minutes
Bodyweight circuit: Lunges - 3 sets of 12 reps each leg, Plank rotations - 3 sets of 12 reps each side, Mountain climbers - 3 sets of 15 reps
Warm up for 10 minutes, Hill repeats on Uetliberg - 4 sets of running up and jogging down, cool down for 10 minutes
Full body workout: Deadlifts - 3 sets of 10 reps, Pull-ups - 3 sets of 8 reps, Russian twists - 3 sets of 15 reps
Stretching and mobility exercises: Yoga poses for flexibility and relaxation
